pages.title: Welcome
pages.content: Welcome to our home! We're excited to have you here.

pages.title: Arrival & Access
pages.content: Please use the main entrance. Access code: 1234.

pages.title: About The House
pages.content: Beautiful family home located in a quiet neighborhood with modern amenities.3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, built in 2005, 1500 sqft.

pages.title: House Rules
pages.content: No smoking, no pets, quiet hours from 10 PM to 7 AM.

pages.title: Getting Around
pages.content: Public transport available nearby. Parking available on-site.

pages.title: Places To Visit
pages.content: Local park, museum, shopping center, and restaurants within walking distance.

pages.title: Restaurants & Bars
pages.content: Recommended places include The Italian Bistro, Sushi Place, and The Local Pub.

pages.title: Offers
pages.content: 10% off your first stay, free breakfast for bookings over 3 nights.

pages.title: City Heritage
pages.content: Springfield is known for its rich history and vibrant culture, with landmarks dating back to the 18th century.

pages.title: Before You Leave
pages.content: Please ensure all lights are off, windows are closed, and keys are returned to the lockbox.

pages.title: Emergency
pages.content: In case of emergency, call 911. For non-emergencies, contact the property manager at (555) 123-4567.
